channel.description: Recent content in dotnet on draptik

item.title: How to setup Jupyter with dotnet 5 on Arch Linux in 2021
item.description: Jupyter “Notebooks” are an interesting way of documenting / teaching code interactively. Jupyter has extended their plattform for other languages (it was originally conceived for Python). See this microsoft anouncement from 2020-06 for dotnet core integration.
